"It [the dwarf star] will try hard to get away, but there is no escape. The black hole will eat it more and more slowly, but never stop," said Andrew King, professor of theoretical astrophysics at the University of Leicester in the U.K. in a statement. King performed the study that found the reason for the X-ray flares. â€¦ [Read more...] about This Star Survived Being Swallowed by a Black Hole
